cross_training_opportunities: Cross-train Senior Backend Engineer on Terraform modules for RDS and EKS.
contractor_augmentation_option: Hire a part-time DevOps contractor to reduce risk.
cost_optimization: High cost of contractor vs. internal training.
future_scaling: Not scalable with a single person. Bottleneck for future growth.

cross_training_opportunities: Mid-level engineer to pair-program on Saga and advanced patterns.
contractor_augmentation_option: Add 1-2 Mid-level NestJS developers to handle feature work.
cost_optimization: Adding one engineer is more cost-effective than delaying the project.
future_scaling: Current team is at capacity. Cannot scale without new hires.

cross_training_opportunities: Documented design reviews with the entire backend team.
contractor_augmentation_option: Engage a principal architect for review of critical designs (e.g., Saga).
cost_optimization: Current resource is sufficient but a single point of failure.
future_scaling: Requires grooming another senior engineer into an architect role.
